sentences.en: And you can also find the crematorium with running overloaded.
sentences.cn: 此外,你还可以看到整日超负荷运转的焚尸炉.

sentences.en: Any lone massive oak he finds growing from a low clover - covered mound marks a crematorium.
sentences.cn: 他还知道,任何一棵从低矮的苜蓿丛中长出的又高又大、茕茕孑立的橡树都意味着一处焚尸场.

sentences.en: Full view. A messy body was entrusted to the crematorium.
sentences.cn: 众目睽睽之下. 一具凌乱的尸体被拖向火葬场.

sentences.en: He says plans to install heat-capture equipment at a crematorium in Cardiff provoked no hostility after staff took to the streets and explained how it works.
sentences.cn: 他说, 在员工们走上街头向人们揭示其工作原理后，卡迪夫（Cardiff）火葬场安装热汲取设备的计划并没有激发敌意。

sentences.en: More than 250 people at the church and 350 at the crematorium chapel.
sentences.cn: 教堂里有超过250人，火葬场的小礼堂里也有350多人。

sentences.en: New cremators commissioned at the Fu Shan Crematorium.
sentences.cn: 富山火葬场新火化炉投入服务.

sentences.en: Our family reached the crematorium to condole on him.
sentences.cn: 我们全家去火葬场吊唁时.

sentences.en: Thick black smoke streamed from the twin smokestacks of the town's crematorium.
sentences.cn: 厚厚的黑烟流从双烟囱的城市的火葬场.

sentences.en: Those that have already invested in heat-capture technology usually divert the excess heat to other crematorium buildings.
sentences.cn: 那些已经花钱采用了热捕捉技术的火葬场，传输到别的火葬场。

sentences.en: You know my friend Chris who owns the crematorium?
sentences.cn: 你知道我那个开火葬场的朋友克里斯 吧 ?

trans.tran_en: a building in which the bodies of dead people are burned at a funeral ceremony
